Deethon
=======
Python3 library to easily download music from `Deezer`_.

Quickstart
----------
Installing
^^^^^^^^^^
.. code-block:: sh

    pip3 install deethon

Initialize
^^^^^^^^^^
.. code-block:: python

    import deethon

    deezer = deethon.Session("DEEZER ARL TOKEN")

Download tracks
^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
Download track by Deezer link

.. code-block:: python

    deezer.download(
        "Deezer track url",
        bitrate="FLAC" # MP3_320 / MP3_256 / MP3_128 (optional)
    )
